rows.label: bf07200100_0010
rows.name: How he's still alive with his Crystal in that state...

rows.label: bf07200100_0030
rows.name:
That's because Heaven's Holy Grail 'Metsu'
is the Master Blade.

rows.label: bf07200100_0040
rows.name: The first Blade created by God.

rows.label: bf07200100_0050
rows.name: Metsu can do things we can only dream of.

rows.label: bf07200100_0060
rows.name: And? How's he going to restore his core exactly?

rows.label: bf07200100_0070
rows.name:
He'll extract the data he's missing from the core of the
other Holy Grail. Then all his power will be restored.

rows.label: bf07200100_0080
rows.name:
Mhmm.
Okay. So what will that do to her?

rows.label: bf07200100_0090
rows.name:
Naturally, her personality would be shredded apart.
Crippled completely in the best case.

rows.label: bf07200100_0100
rows.name:
That's vicious...
He really has a terrible personality.
